Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: For the patch title, change “add command to remove marks” to “implement unmark command”, so that people looking for it can spot the commit faster.

Author: koebi
Comment: no. when setting a new mark, it is checked if there is a container that has the same mark. if so, the mark is removed. Therefore, marks are unique.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: To clarify: mention that marks are unique.
